text: “Nde kha khira shivi ganɨ, nta ram muuŋgi hɨɨa muuŋgi? Nta vhɨra wari ga nzuav ŋaara mbatɨga mbui fhuvara. Nta vhɨra wari ga nzuav shagi ga mbui fhuvara. Gu guigira khar nde nzuai, Soromon fhum ŋgui gari guman pan ki, ana guigira shagi vhuuiŋra sharav, sɨɨn vhuuŋra mbui. Ana mba nzɨɨi sɨɨŋ, nta kha khira shivi nzɨɨi sɨɨŋ kambarigi fhuvara. Kha khira shivi nzɨɨi sɨɨŋ guigira ana mba nzɨɨi sɨɨŋ kambarigi.
